abstract: Croatian tennis player Marin Cilic has struggled to keep momentum after winning his first Grand Slam title at 2014 United States Open; has not reached a men's final since that victory.
lead_paragraph: As the No. 14 seed last year, Cilic claimed his first Grand Slam title. But since then, he has been bothered by a shoulder injury and has yet to reach the final of any tournament.

headline.main: Marin Cilic Struggles to Get Back Into Zone After U.S. Open Success
headline.print_headline: Struggling to Find the Zone After a Grand Slam Success

snippet: As the No. 14 seed last year, Cilic claimed his first Grand Slam title. But since then, he has been bothered by a shoulder injury and has yet to reach the final of any tournament.
